=== '''Definition''' ===
The following is definition of 60 vertical levels as currently (2010) used in perational AROME model at Meteo France. The table lists ahalf and bhalf accompanied with pressure at half level, ph (in hPa), and full level, pf (hPa), corresponding values of pressure for a surface pressure of P,,s,,= 1013.250 hPa, and the level depth (hPa) around each full level
